title: Video - "Officer! Officer!": Trump Supporters On Seeing Shooter On Roof
content: The US Secret Service is under fire over its most stunning failure in decades following the assassination attempt on Trump and witnesses claiming they had flagged the shooter to the officials before he took the shot are only adding to the crisis.
summary: The US Secret Service is under fire over its most stunning failure in decades following the assassination attempt on Trump and witnesses claiming they had flagged the shooter to the officials before he took the shot are only adding to the crisis.

title: Father, Daughter Die At US National Park After Running Out Of Water
content: By the time the pair was found, they were already dead, according to the National Park Service.

title: Boost For Trump, Time For Biden: Expert Explains Assassination Bid Impact
content: The assassination attempt on Donald Trump has provided the Republican leader with a unique opportunity to emerge as a taller leader, US political scientist Ian Bremmer told NDTV in an interview.
summary: The assassination attempt on Donald Trump has provided the Republican leader with a unique opportunity to emerge as a taller leader, US political scientist Ian Bremmer told NDTV in an interview.

title: "I'll Be Back Soon": Wiz Khalifa Charged Over Cannabis Possession In Romania
content: US rapper Wiz Khalifa has been charged with illegal drug possession after he consumed cannabis on stage while performing at a seaside festival in Romania, prosecutors said Sunday.
summary: US rapper Wiz Khalifa has been charged with illegal drug possession after he consumed cannabis on stage while performing at a seaside festival in Romania, prosecutors said Sunday.

title: King Charles III Writes To Donald Trump After Assassination Attempt
content: Britain's head of state King Charles III has written to former US president Donald Trump after he survived an assassination attempt, Buckingham Palace said on Monday.
summary: Britain's head of state King Charles III has written to former US president Donald Trump after he survived an assassination attempt, Buckingham Palace said on Monday.

title: In Trump's Recollection Of Shooting, Special Note For Secret Service
content: A day after Donald Trump survived an assassination bid at his last campaign rally, the former US President Donald Trump praised the Secret Service officials for their heroic actions.

title: LinkedIn Founder Under Fire For "Wishing Trump Was Martyr" Before Shooting
content: After the attempt on Donald Trump’s life during a campaign rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday, LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman has clarified his "actual martyr" remark in a post on X.

title: Imran Khan's Party To Be Banned By Pak For Alleged Anti-State Activities
content: Former Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan's party Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf will be banned for its alleged involvement in anti-state activities, the government said Monday.
summary: Former Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan's party Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf will be banned for its alleged involvement in anti-state activities, the government said Monday.

title: Man Charged With Murder By UK Police After Bodies Were Found In Suitcase
content: A suspect has been charged with murder after the bodies of two men, one of whom was from France, were found dumped in suitcases on a well-known UK bridge, police said on Monday.
summary: A suspect has been charged with murder after the bodies of two men, one of whom was from France, were found dumped in suitcases on a well-known UK bridge, police said on Monday.

title: "Canada Is Where A Guy From Punjab...": Trudeau On Meeting Diljit Dosanjh

title: The Terrifying History Of The AR-15 Assault Rifle, America's Most Popular Weapon

title: 30 Hours Since Trump Survives Assassination Bid, Hunt Continues For Motive
content: Over 30 hours after a bullet pierced Donald Trump's ear at a rally ahead of the US' biggest election, the motive behind the high-profile assassination attempt remains unknown.

title: AI Chip Demand Drives Taiwan Chipmaker's Second Quarter Profits Up By 30%
content: The world's largest contract chipmaker, whose customers include Apple and Nvidia, has benefited from a surge towards AI that has pushed TSMC's stock - and the broader Taiwan market - to record highs.
summary: The world's largest contract chipmaker, whose customers include Apple and Nvidia, has benefited from a surge towards AI that has pushed TSMC's stock - and the broader Taiwan market - to record highs.

title: China's Third Plenum Addresses Economic Challenges, Sets Long Term Reforms
content: China's ruling Communist Party commenced its so-called third plenum on Monday, a major meeting held roughly once every five years to map out the general direction of the country's long-term social and economic policies.
summary: China's ruling Communist Party commenced its so-called third plenum on Monday, a major meeting held roughly once every five years to map out the general direction of the country's long-term social and economic policies.

title: Instagram Model Forced Followers Into Sex Work, Kept Them As Slaves
content: Former Brazilian model and US-based wellness influencer Kat Torres has been sentenced to eight years in prison for the human trafficking and slavery of women, after an FBI investigation found that two women living with her had gone missing in 2022.
summary: Former Brazilian model and US-based wellness influencer Kat Torres has been sentenced to eight years in prison for the human trafficking and slavery of women, after an FBI investigation found that two women living with her had gone missing in 2022.

title: "I'm Supposed To Be Dead": Trump Recalls Rally Attack In Latest Interview

title: Japanese AI Startup Turns Dating AI Into Reality
